issue.title: Function for emailing to PROXY users
issue.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

A convenient function in the admin panel of the PROXY would be the ability to send an email to all PROXY users (or a group of users, for a specific service for example) in order to inform them about :

- service evolutions (new capacities, renaming of layers,etc...)
- server maintenance (server down for a certain period)
- any other info that may impact their use of the services

To discuss... (the funtion could also be available for geoservices suppliers ? use RSS feed ?)

comments.body:
**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

Is an evolution, not a bug ! ... sorry

**Original author :** Blatti Yves

I don't think it's a relevant feature ton integrate a mailing system +so specific+.
With easySDI v4 access to OGC services is integrated id DB, access can be granted to 'users', 'organisms' and 'organisms categories'. Same for any access scope in the application.
I would prefer an export facility in contact component with filters (organism,organisms categories, joomla group, etc...), this would be more flexible.

Is this precise mail feature still a need ?

**Original author :** Mérour Xavier

This mail feature is not needed anymore I think (at least not by us).

I reject it.
